long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides extra InScript keyboards on ChromeOS for text entry in the following languages:
1. Hindi (Devanagari)
2. Marathi (Devanagari)
3. Kannada
4. Odia
5. Telugu
6. Malayalam
7. Bengali

To use these keyboards, please install the extension, and then add the desrired keyboard layout from Settings -> Keyboard -> Change input settings -> Add. For more information, see https://support.google.com/chromebook/answer/1059492.
